channel.title: Comments on: Continuous Delivery Project – Setting up Continuous Integration
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Helen
item.dc:creator: Helen
item.content:encoded:
Right now I am working on Jenkins, but I am having issue to deploy the build. On your post you have said this:

“Project properties, select the tab for “Package/Publish Web” and check the “Create deployment package as zip” option”

Were you referencing the project properties on Visual Studio?

item.description: I'm a big fan of CC.NET but this solutions worth a try too.
item.content:encoded: I’m a big fan of CC.NET but this solutions worth a try too.
